attributes.Name: The Delph
attributes.eventDescription: IT'S TIME FOR TOTS AT THE DELPH💛 Join us for a morning filled with enjoyable activities, allowing your little one to engage, dance and build confidence whilst you have  an opportunity to connect with other parents/guardians. 🥳 Let's make some memories 😊

attributes.Name: The Daten
attributes.eventDescription: IT'S TIME FOR TOTS AT THE DELPH💛 Join us for a morning filled with enjoyable activities, allowing your little one to engage, dance and build confidence whilst you have  an opportunity to connect with other parents/guardians. 🥳 Let's make some memories 😊

attributes.Name: Patricroft
attributes.eventDescription: Come & join us for our Fun For All Party, open to all ages at @patricroftconsclub! The disco will be held on Friday 5th May, and we'll be celebrating for 3 hours from 6:30pm🥳  Feel free to come & go as you please throughout the night, you and your children don't want to miss out on the dancing, magic & giggles 🤩 There might even be a few prizes to be won too👀  Tickets are £8.50 per child and if you buy 3 tickets, you get 1 free, so make sure to bring all your friends!

attributes.Name: Tilwalds
attributes.eventDescription: Looking for some Friday Fun for you and the kids?⭐  Join us to party & play bingo at Tilwards on Friday 28th April and you won't be disappointed🔥💗  In true Louby Lou and Ibiza style, we'll be giving away some fun prizes, dancing, and spreading laughter all around🙌
